name: Leopard Handbag
description:
Lovingly handmade in the UK, our brand new range of handbags incorporates 1950s modernist styling with top quality retro fabrics, all metal hardware, durable materials, and natural bamboo handles for a touch of the exotic!

This one is crafted in a tough, stiff base material covered in heavyweight leopard print fabric, lined in beautiful quality hand-stitched cherry red satin, with metal feet and magnetic closure, varnished black bamboo root handle, and the Kalandra Jane Designs label inside, all in an angular 50s shape. 

41cm x 11cm at the base, 22cm high not including handle, 40cm high including handle - can be carried by the handle or worn as a shoulder bag.

The Velvet Kitty Ears fascinator is available under the products > cocktail hats tab at the top of the page!

name: Tattoo Handbag - Black
description:
Lovingly handmade in the UK, our brand new range of handbags incorporates 1950s modernist styling with top quality retro fabrics, all metal hardware, durable materials, and natural bamboo handles for a touch of the exotic!

This one is crafted in a tough, stiff base material covered in heavyweight tattoo print cotton duck, lined in beautiful quality hand-stitched cherry red satin, with metal feet and magnetic closure, varnished black bamboo root handle, and the Kalandra Jane Designs label inside, all in an angular 50s shape.

name: Atomic Handbag - Black
description:

name: Polka Dot Fruit Fascinator
description:
This teardrop shaped fascinator like all my hats is handmade, and measures 14cm front to back (approx).

Professionally made from a sturdy, stiff base material covered in chic black and white polka dot fabric, edged with satin binding in either black or red, it is topped off with deliciously realistic fruits and a big, bright, sunny yellow orchid blossom.

The hat is lined with matching faux silk fabric. It is fixed to the head using a sturdy comb fastening, but I can also add elastic to be worn round the back of the head under the hair at no extra cost, in black or blonde. Just send me a message if you'd like this adding.

A beautiful and stylish accessory, this hat would look gorgeous with a retro Hawaiian outfit!

name: Silk & Pearls Teardrop Fascinator
description:
This one-of-a-kind fascinator like all my hats is handmade, and measures 14cm across (approx).

Made from a sturdy, stiff base material covered in sumptuous royal blue duchess satin, with a lovely satin ribbon trim in palest ivory, and delicate blue merry widow veiling in a scalloped ruffle design, this one-off custom hat is adorned with beautiful glass pearl beads and handmade silk dupion roses.

The hat is lined with matching faux silk fabric, and is fixed to the head using a sturdy comb fastening. This can also feature covered elastic at no extra cost in either black or blonde, which can be secured round the back of your head for extra security, just drop me a message when you order if you'd like this adding to your hat.

name: Zebra Cocktail Hat - Mint Green Trim
description:
This one-off piece like all my hats is handmade, and measures 12cm across (approx).

Made from a sturdy, stiff base material covered in luxuriously smooth zebra print satin, this custom fascinator has a double row of satin trim in black and mint green, delicate mint merry widow veiling with soft velvet spots, and is topped off with a pretty matching bow!

The hat is lined with matching faux silk fabric, and is fixed to the head using a sturdy comb fastening. This can also feature covered elastic at no extra cost in either black or blonde, which can be secured round the back of your head for extra security, just drop me a message when you order if you'd like this adding to your hat.

name: Leopard Satin Mini Top Hat - Red Trim
description:
This mini top hat like all my hats is handmade, and measures 17cm front to back x 9cm high (approx).

Made from a sturdy, stiff base material covered in sultry leopard print satin, edged in red satin ribbon binding, topped off with a flourish of black merry widow veiling, and a pretty matching sequin-trimmed satin bow!

The hat is lined with matching faux silk fabric, is fixed to the head using a sturdy transparent comb fastening and also features covered elastic which can either be secured round the back of your head, or tucked up inside the hat. The default elastic on this hat will be black, but I can change it for beige (better for blondes!) if you drop me a message via the 'contact' tab.

The comb is mounted on elastic loops so it can be removed to add your own headband, if you prefer.

Perfect for weddings, proms, burlesque performance, a day at the races or just to add a perfect finishing touch to a special outfit!

A beautiful and stylish accessory for any burlesque, gothic, rockabilly or retro - lovin' girl!

Professionally made from a sturdy, stiff base material covered in juicy watermelon print fabric, edged with tropical green satin binding and whimsical yellow pom-poms, it is topped off with a flourish of pink merry widow veiling, incredibly realistic grapes, delicious artificial strawberries and a big, bright, sunny yellow orchid blossom.

name: Mini Satin Sailor Hat
description:
The perfect miniature sailor hat! This super cute mini hat will top off a nautical-inspired outfit perfectly.

This hat measures 13cm across by 4cm high (approx) and is constructed from a sturdy, stiff base material covered in gorgeous off-white duchess satin. The design is completed by a band of red satin, jolly blue and white striped ribbons, and a matching bow with a gold metal anchor charm. 

The hat is fixed to the head using a transparent plastic comb and covered elastic which can be secured round the back of the head or tucked up inside the hat. The comb is mounted on elastic loops, should you wish to use a headband or hairpins instead.  

Utterly adorable and perfect for cosplay and fancy dress, burlesque performances, hen parties, or just to top off a seafaring ensemble and make the sailors wink!

name: Pinstripe Mini Top Hat
description:

Made from a sturdy, stiff base fabric covered in smart black and white pinstripe fabric, edged in black satin ribbon binding, topped off with a flourish of black merry widow veiling and a pretty matching satin-trimmed bow!

The hat is lined with matching faux silk fabric, is fixed to the head using a sturdy transparent comb fastening and also features covered elastic which can either be secured round the back of your head, or tucked up inside the hat. The default elastic on this hat will be black, but I can change it for beige (better for blondes!) if you drop me a message via the 'contact' tab.

The comb is mounted on elastic loops so it can be removed to add your own headband, if you prefer.

Perfect for weddings, proms, burlesque performance, a day at the races or just to add a perfect finishing touch to a special outfit!

A beautiful and stylish accessory for any burlesque, gothic, steampunk, rockabilly or retro - lovin' girl!

name: Alice In Wonderland Fascinator
description:
This mini hat like all my hats is handmade, and measures 14cm front to back (approx). This particular piece is a very limited edition, and is professionally handmade and luxuriously decorated. 

Inspired by Alice in Wonderland, this would be the perfect accessory for any special night out, burlesque performance, or a beautiful accessory to add flair to a cosplay or fancy dress outfit, or Wonderland-themed wedding.

Made from a sturdy, stiff base material covered in beautiful baby blue duchess satin, with ruffled white lace edging, black satin ribbon trim and delicate white merry widow veiling, adorned with an 'Eat Me' cookie and tiny glass 'Drink Me' bottle filled with shimmering glitter, and topped off with a pretty matching bow!

The hat is lined with matching faux silk fabric, and is attached to a classic black Alice band.

name: Peacock Feather Silk Teardrop Fascinator
description:
This mini hat like all my hats is professionally handmade and luxuriously decorated, and measures 14cm front to back (approx). 

This piece is made from a sturdy, stiff base material covered in beautiful teal silk taffeta, with a lovely black satin ribbon trim and delicate purple merry widow veiling, adorned with tiny purple oilslick-effect glass seed beads, all topped off with a glorious peacock feather and a pretty matching bow!

The hat is lined with matching faux silk fabric, and is fixed to the head using a sturdy comb fastening. This can also feature covered elastic at no extra cost in either black or blonde, which can be secured round the back of your head for extra security, just drop me a message when you order if you'd like this adding to your hat.

A beautiful and sophisticated accessory for any bride or bridesmaid or for a special event, this particular fascinator is so classically luxurious it could work with any style from Victoriana to contemporary.

name: Cherry Bow Pillbox Hat
description:
This pillbox hat like all my hats is handmade, and measures 15cm front to back (approx).

A beautiful retro design! Professionally made from a sturdy, stiff base material covered in beautiful quality cherry print cotton sateen, with three juicy-looking realistic cherries and a pretty matching bow at the back.

The hat is lined with matching faux silk fabric. It is fixed to the head using covered elastic which can be secured round the back of your head, you could also add a fancy hatpin for a lovely vintage look. The default elastic on this hat will be black, but I can change it for beige (better for blondes!) if you drop me a message via the 'contact' tab.

name: Carmen Miranda Fruit Pillbox Hat
description:

A beautiful retro design! Professionally made from a sturdy, stiff base material covered in sunny straw braid and topped with a dazzling array of realistic artificial fruit! Apples, fuzzy peaches, cherries, grapes, bananas and strawberries, with flowers and leaves too! (fruit may vary occasionally but will always be fabulous!)

The hat is lined with matching faux silk fabric. It is fixed to the head using covered elastic which can be secured round the back of your head, you could also add a fancy hatpin for a lovely vintage look. name: Cupcake Burlesque Pasties / Nipple Tassels
description:
Fabulous and fun sparkling sequinned cupcake burlesque pasties / nipple tassels, perfect for burlesque performances or just in the bedroom!

Sequins are individually sewn onto sturdy base material and backed with smooth black pvc, and are handmade in the UK by Kalandra Jane Designs. 

Available in pale green (shown) or baby pink.

Approx. 6.5cm across, they can be affixed to the breast using body tape or false eyelash glue.
